# hex digits
(?:0[Xx]|U\+|#)[a-f0-9A-FGgRr]{2,}[Uu]?[Ll]?\b

# long runs of a single character
\b([A-Za-z])\1{3,}\b

# Windows paths
\\telegraf

# The U/u is intentionally omitted to avoid case issues.
"nknown table 'user_statistics'"

# ...
https://www.juniper.net/documentation/en_US/junos/topics/concept/junos-telemetry-interface-oveview.html

"[a-z0-9]*wiihqumwmqgggemzoaivm[a-z0-9]*"
spelling of memoory
state_kv_commiting_lat

"Database modifys/sec"
"# of Exceps Thrown / sec"
Détérioration
Humidité
Luminosité
name=Temp.*,type=com.fibaro.temperatureSensor
